missing_evidence.action: Ensure evidence artifacts are declared in telemetry and included in the epistemic graph.

missing_counterevidence.action: Add counterevidence paths or lower claim confidence.

confidence_miscalibration.action: Recalibrate claim confidence values against evidence strength.

telemetry_regression_risk.action: Adjust guidance knobs or perturbation limits to reduce regression risk.

schema_gap.action: Update telemetry schema or emit missing fields.

event_stream_gap.action: Emit missing TEL events or update event stream configuration.

artifact_receipt_gap.action: Ensure artifact receipts are generated and validated.

coherence_regression.action: Review guidance diff thresholds to mitigate coherence regression.

coherence_drift.action: Reduce perturbation caps to limit coherence drift.

contradiction.action: Resolve contradictory claims and clarify statement ownership.

ethical_symmetry_violation.action: Update ethical symmetry thresholds or provide additional context.

memory_deviation.action: Adjust memory drift tolerances or recalibrate memory kernel inputs.
